channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Best mates Riley and Maddie battle a boys' team, and pals Masai and Ernest swap the pitch for the kitchen. Michael Dawson is in Skill Showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Drama
channel.desc: Release the hounds! Campers are hunted by a pack of fearsome attack dogs... and one pug.

channel.desc: Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Heat-loving hippies move into Mr Krabs' soup vat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Another adventure with the mischievous young sheep and his flock. The Farmer decides to get a robotic sheepdog, but it turns out to be even stricter than Bitzer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold receive a crash course in the customs of America's oldest holiday when they cover for Jeopardy Mouse as she takes time off for Thanksgiving. After barely escaping from the war zone of a Black Friday sale, they find themselves back at Jeopardy's apartment. DM prepares to tuck into the plentiful Thanksgiving spread when Hissteria and Ham Hands rise out of the dishes. They announce their newly formed coalition and joint plans to vanquish America. DM sticks to his stand-in duties and refuses Jeopardy's help as he and Penfold follow Hissteria and Ham Hands' trail. They find the villainous pair hijacking the Thanksgiving Day parade - launching a gas attack from the air that will turn everything in sight to stuffing. With holiday-saving solutions at a premium, Penfold convinces a reluctant DM to call Jeopardy for help. Jeopardy assures DM that doing things with friends is what Thanksgiving is all about as they set about taking Ham Hands and Hissteria down. They distract them long enough to cut them loose along with the rest of the gas-filled balloons.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes set out on a quest to find out who is draining colour from the forest and muster all their positivity to save it from greyness.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Much to the kids' horror, Gramps starts spending a lot of time with mean Miss Molly! The gang do whatever it takes to keep the two apart.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find magic books that make their story content appear in real life when opened.

channel.desc: The Lemmings discover a card that enables them to teleport a magic closet.

channel.desc: A prehistoric sponge is unfrozen and causes chaos.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: A flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced madcap, stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. The potato racers are driving each other round the bend, the DIY doughnuts attempt to fix the bathroom, the cavemen mushrooms come face to face with some big, hairy mammoth pots, fearless Pete Parsnip takes on a ferocious foe, and Slippery Nana takes on a pizza-cutting unicycle in the talent show.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall tracks cheetahs across Zambia by motorbike, witnessing epic hunting and the challenges faced by this endangered predator.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Stage Stars
channel.desc: It's the start of a new school year, and the school is buzzing as boarders find out who they are sharing a dorm with and day pupils reunite at the lockers. No time is wasted on day one as the students go head-to-head for roles in the new show: Anything Goes. And this year could be life-changing for dancer Jakob as he starts his preparations for one of the world?s most prestigious international ballet competitions.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Meet the Tottenham Hotspur academy players. Lia Lewis picks her Three of the Best, and Dominic Solanke takes on 11-year-old Konan in Skill Showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Christina fights for the right to play football again, while rivals Hawx United and Foxborough start sharing an academy - what could possibly go wrong.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Gwen is shocked into drastic action when her father refuses to sign her application to finishing school. Meanwhile, Darrell and Felicity fall out during the North Tower Spelling Bee.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: From taking man to the moon to figuring out how to get rid of a poo in a submarine, Mark Labbett joins Rattus for a look at some of history?s most brilliant brainboxes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall is in Brazil searching for the world?s most elusive cat: the jaguar. He sees them swimming, meets mothers and cubs, and even witnesses one jaguar hunting a caiman.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Gwen is delighted when Ron suggests they go for a walk together, but it quickly derails when Gwen is left to babysit. Meanwhile, Felicity discovers her love for running.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy discovers a special lamp that can compact organic elements.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. Shaun finds a camera which some ramblers have dropped and sets about taking snapshots of the flock. Bitzer is soon on the trail of the missing camera.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: With Paul on vacation, Pieface falls under the influence of a fiery chilli pepper and unexpectedly turns rogue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: During their quest to stop Balthazar the Fabulous from sucking every last sunbeam out of the sky, the heroes realise there is something wrong with Hoofius, who keeps tripping up and has totally lost his confidence. Herbert explains that Hoofius has lost his mojo! To help their friend and complete the quest, the heroes take Hoofius up Mojo Mountain to help him get his mojo back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Dog finds out he has fleas! But when he befriends them, he must hide them from his family to prevent them from getting zapped.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Gwen plots for movie star and Miss Grayling?s estranged cousin Lily Vernon to visit the school. Lily has her own secrets. Meanwhile, Nancy plans a prank to stop eating carrots.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Michelle holds a scholarship fundraiser for young dancers, while the elite competition gets a step up. Amanda misses a band practice and feels bad about lying to her new friends. West and Giselle get caught up in a talent war.
